name: Musicista
body:
![Musicista](http://www.musicistaapp.de/wp-content/uploads/2014/07/Icons_AppIcon-300x300.png)

# Musicista

Musicista is a tool that combines music with computer science and offers the ability to run algorithms on musical notation. It has its own file format `.musicista` to store all information, but it can also read `MusicXML`- and `Midi`-files.

![](https://scontent-frt3-1.xx.fbcdn.net/v/t1.0-9/10269404_950939264922958_7732195614007707671_n.png?oh=206d1e295a42e9a42e70822908f1544c&oe=58B614D3)
